channel.title: Why isnt my server running please help!
channel.description:
ok so i have 2 sources, both are 317 they both run on the SAME CLIENT.... and i have changed the ip on the client. However one of the servers allow me and my friends to connect and the other one does NOT. I am using hamachi but i don't think it makes a difference because 1 of the servers allow me to connect.
the only difference i see is that one of the servers says "server listening on port: 43594" but the other one doesn't say that. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/4hvzex.jpg[/img]
ps: please do not tell me to portforward because portforwarding is not working for me just yet.

item.title: Why isnt my server running please help!
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

no some servers just reject clients that are differen’t to prevent errors

Read full topic
item.source: Why isnt my server running please help!

item.title: Why isnt my server running please help!
item.dc:creator: @owner5 owner5
item.description:
@owner5 wrote:

imsuperman05:

You cannot mix clients with sources, they have to be made for the source because of the UID. What are the sources that you are using?

brokenx v2 and acrylicx …i use Galkons client… you are right but i can still check if the server is working it logs in and quickly shuts down but in this case, it just says “error connecting to server”

Read full topic
item.source: Why isnt my server running please help!
